free.name: World of Warships — Long Live the King
free.detailed_description:
Sternly—and politely—rule the waves with three different Royal Navy ships, each representing a unique gameplay style. On top of that, a full day of Warships Premium Account to start you off on the right foot. Battleship Bellerophon, cruiser Caledon, and destroyer Valkyrie each come with their own Commander with 3 skill points.

This bundle includes:

  • Tier III researchable* Destroyer Valkyrie with a 3-skill point Commander
  • Tier III researchable* Cruiser Caledon with a 3-skill point Commander
  • Tier III researchable* Battleship Bellerophon with a 3-skill point Commander
  • 1 day of Warships Premium Account
  • Moreover, if you log in to the game before July 31, 2022, 02:59 UTC, you'll get 1 additional day of Warships Premium Account and a Royal Navy Destroyers container

If you already own one or more of these ships, you will receive compensation for them in credits:
  • Valkyrie — 144,375 credits
  • Caledon — 150,675 credits
  • Bellerophon — 207,900 credits

*These ships are researchable — meaning that they can be earned in-game through playing. This bundle offers to speed up your low Tier research by giving you immediate access to this nation's different ship types.

Please note: The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created on Steam.
